collection_holder_name: Department of Special Collections, University of California at Los Angeles (UCLA)
pageContext.collection_description: Consists of production files for film, radio and stage productions, correspondence, photographs, press clippings, screenplays, shooting scripts, material on research, budget and publicity materials, interviews, articles and addresses by Wilson. Also includes material relating to Orson Welles and the Mercury Theater production of "Macbeth" and material chronicling Wilson's efforts to transfer the 1948 CBS radio series, Doorway to Life to other media.
